overview: Legendary LA rock band and self-styled icons of “Alternative Nation”, Jane's Addiction, are officially back. REPLAY 2020, featuring a 7-track set list from this year’s Virtual Lollapalooza, will reassure fans that Dave Navarro, Perry Farrell, Stephen Perkins and Chris Chaney are in great physical shape and ready to get back on the horse creatively in 2021.
title: Janes Addiction Replay 2020 - Virtual Lollapalooza
